mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_b_user( uid,name,nickname,gender,birth, age,nation,profession,province_code,city_code, district_code,address,mobile,idcard,reserve1, reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,reserve5 ) VALUES( #{uid},#{name},#{nickname},#{gender},#{birth}, #{age},#{nation},#{profession},#{provinceCode},#{cityCode}, #{districtCode},#{address},#{mobile},#{idcard.id},#{reserve1}, #{reserve2},#{reserve3},#{reserve4},#{reserve5} )
